wrist.name: Anodized Deflectors
wrist.special: Gain Parry and Avoidance for 6 sec, then emit a shockwave the deals damage. (30 sec cooldown)

wrist.name: Gold-Coated Superconductors
wrist.special: Taking Nature damage grants you a one minute boost to all secondary stats.

chest.name: Petticoat of the Self-Stylized Azerite Baron

wrist.name: Hyperthread Wristwraps
wrist.special: Reduce the remaining cooldown of your 3 most recently cast spells by 5 sec. (2 min cd)
